short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your truly anonymous shortened link/text management tool for your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boosts your productivity with shortcuts that can point to any link or even text. With intuitive links like th/aws-log or th/pricing eliminate the need to search for any url again.

With ThunderLinks:

1. Convert long URLs or texts into easy-to-use shortcuts like th/address or th/staging
2. Create shortcuts in one click with ⌘ / Ctrl + Shift + E
3. Get shortcuts suggestions directly in your address bar. Just type “th/” and then hit “tab” to get suggestions
4. Translate thunderlink shortcuts on any input on any website. Just type your shortcut and hit [SHIFT] to translate
5. Translate shortcuts on Gmail as you type

Thunderlinks save hours of your time and boost your productivity.
